featured.text: take pride in (B) fall short of (C) get out of (D) keep up with 18.(A)
Aboriginal carvers continue to carve totems as symbols of their cultural pride and clan kinship.
Those who take pride in being decisive often try their best to consider all the factors beforehand.

definition.zh_def: 自豪感；對自己或他人成就的滿意或驕傲。
definition.en_def: A feeling of deep pleasure or satisfaction derived from one's own achievements or the achievements of others.
definition.example: She took great pride in her work as a teacher.
